characters.name: Water Lairei
characters.description: A Support Sniper. Her recommended stats are Health and Speed. Acquired by Donation Event.

skills.name: S1 (Basic ATK) Dragonflame Dance
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. Increases Critical Hit Damage of the user and ally with the highest Attack for 1 turn. Additionally, has a 50% chance to trigger Blitz 1 time. When Blitz is triggered, Active Skill is immediately used regardless of its cooldown status. More than one Blitz cannot be triggered in a row.

skills.name: S2 (Skill) Torrential Volley
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 70% chance to increase Speed of each ally respectively for 2 turns. Additionally, grants Divine Luck to the user for 2 turns. Divine Luck gives a 15% chance to gain an extra turn. Up to 3 extra turns can be gained in this way.

skills.name: S3 (Ultimate) Raging Waterstorm
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 100% chance to remove 3 of the most recent debuffs from each ally respectively. This attack deals 300% more damage to fire enemies. Increases Crit.Damage of water allies for 2 turns. gains 2 Spirit.

skills.name: (Aptitude Skill) Leviathan's Glory
skills.description: Increases damage dealt by all allies against fire enemies by 10%. This skill can only be upgraded by unlocking Aptitudes and cannot be reset. This effect does not stack.

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Magnate's Insight
skills.description: Increases Health by 5%

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Golden Wordsmith
skills.description: Reduces damage taken from water enemies by 5%.

characters.name: Earth Lairei
characters.description: An Earth Offense Striker. Her recommended stats are Attack and Crit Damage. Acquired via Hero Contract or Contract Summon.

skills.name: S1 (Basic ATK) Dragonflame Dance
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. Increases Critical Hit Damage of the user by 25% (stacks up to 3 times). This effect expires after defeating a wave of enemies.

skills.name: S2 (Skill) Gale Volley
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Increases Critical Hit Rate of the user for 2 turns (stacking up to 3 times). This effect expires after defeating a wave of enemies

skills.name: S3 (Ultimate) Raging Windstorm
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Increases Attack of the user for 2 turns if the attack is a critical hit. Deals 100% more damage for every stack of Increased Critical Hit Rate on the user (up to a maximum of 300%)

skills.name: (Aptitude Skill) Behemoth's Wrath
skills.description: Increases damage dealt against water-elemental enemies by 20%. This skill can only be upgraded by unlocking Aptitudes and cannot be reset.

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Paradise's Blessing
skills.description: Reduces damage taken from water-elemental enemies by 5%.

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Blessed Dragoness
skills.description: Increases Critical Hit Damage by 10%

characters.name: Earth Icateztol
characters.description: An offense striker, her recommended properties are Attack and Crit DMG

skills.name: S1 (Basic ATK) Verdure Piercer
skills.description: Attacks selected enemy. Grants Regeneration to the user for 2 turns

skills.name: S2 (Skill) Verdant Wish
skills.description: Removes all debuffs from user. Fills the action gauge of the user by 100%. Additionally, grants Action Ready to the user for 3 turns. Action Ready fills the action gauge by 25% upon receiving damage. Hits taken by Counterattack, Assist, Blitz, and Flurry do not trigger this effect.

skills.name: S3 (Ultimate) Theos Quetzal
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Deals up to 5x additional damage based on the targets maximum health. Additionally, critical hit damage of this attack increases by 100% if the user is under the effects of Action Ready.

skills.name: (Aptitude Skill) Behemoth's Wrath
skills.description: Increases damage dealt against water-elemental enemies by 20%. This skill can only be upgraded by unlocking Aptitudes and cannot be reset.

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Guardian of the Forest
skills.description: Increases damage to water enemies by 11%

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Blooming Hope
skills.description: Increases Critical Hit Damage by 50%

characters.name: Dark Alev
characters.description: An offensive Guardian. Recommended stats are Defense and Speed

skills.name: S1 (Basic ATK) Reverse Slash
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. Damage dealt increases based on the user's Defense. Fills the action gauge of all allies by 10%. Fills the action gauge of dark elemental allies by an added 15%.

skills.name: S2 (Skill) Ignis Buster
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage dealt increases based on user's Defense. Fills the action gauge of all allies by 20%. Fills the action gauge of dark elemental allies by an added 15%. Additionally, grants Revenge for 2 turns. Increases Attack Strength of all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: S3 (Ultimate) Deathscythe
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage dealt increases based on the user's Defense. Damage dealt increases by 200% if the user is under the effects of Revenge. Additionally, grants Resolve to the user for 3 turns. This attack deals 150% more damage against light elementals. Resolve increases damage dealt against enemies by 100%. Increases damage taken by the user by 35%. Additionally, reduces damage taken by all allies by 35%, except for Guardians and allies under the effects of Resolve.

skills.name: (Aptitude Skill) Nix's Protection
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by all allies from light-elemental enemies by 7%. Increases damage dealt by the user against light enemies by 7%. This skill can only be upgraded by unlocking Aptitudes and cannot be reset. this effect does not stack.

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Compassion and Malevolence
skills.description: Increases damage dealt against light enemies by 20%.

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Usurper's Scythe
skills.description: Increase Defense by 25%

characters.name: Light Ahilam
characters.description: A defense guardian who scales on Health. Recommended stats are Health and Speed. She is the best universal guardian.

skills.name: S1 (Basic ATK) Piercing Spark
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. Damage dealt increases based on the user's maximum health. 90% chance to reduce Defense of the target for 2 turns.

skills.name: S2 (Skill) Flash Ignite
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage dealt increases based on the user's maximum health. Fills the action gauge of all allies by 40%. Increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns. Grants Solar Resolve for 2 turns. Solar Resolve increases damage dealt to enemies by 200%, damage taken by 20%, and reduces damage taken by all allies by 35% excluding Guardian heroes and allies under the effects of Resolve. This effect does not stack with Resolve and cannot be transferred or removed.

skills.name: S3 (Ultimate) Solas Burst
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Damage dealt increases based on user(s) maximum health. Deals up to 5x addiitonal damage based on the targets maximum health. Grants Invincibility to Striker allies for 3 turns upon attacking a dark elemental enemy. 100% chance to inflict Elemental Weakness on all dark enemies for 4 turns. Targets under Elemental Weakness are always considered to be at elemental disadvantage.

skills.name: (Aptitude Skill) Oberon's Protection
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by all allies from dark element enemies by 7%. Increases damage dealt by user against dark elementals by 7%.

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Solar Blessing
skills.description: Increases Health by 25%

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Will of Humanity
skills.description: Increases damage dealt to dark enemies by 20%.

characters.name: Fire Vanessa
characters.description: A Defense Cleric who scales on Defense and Health(S3). Her recommended stats are Health and Defense.

skills.name: S1 (Basic ATK) Melody of Passion
skills.description: Attacks selected enemy. Attack strength increases based on user's Defense.

skills.name: S2 (skill) Melody of Salvation
skills.description: Heals all allies and increases Defense for 2 turns. Heal strength increases based on the users Defense.

skills.name: S3 (Ultimate) Battleground Symphony
skills.description: Heals all allies and grants Invincibility for 1 turn. Heal strength increases based on user's maximum health.

characters.name: Dark Arkanath
characters.description: A Support Warrior. Her recommended stats are Health and Speed. She's acquired by featured summon.

skills.name: S1 (Basic ATK) Vanishing Strikes
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. 70% chance to inflict Exposed Weakness on the target for 2 turns. Additionally, inflicts 1 stack of Hunter's Mark on the target for 5 turns. Attack strength increases based on the user's Speed. Exposed Weakness increases damage taken by 5% for every debuff inflicted up to a maximum of 50%. Hunter's Mark stacks and serves as a condition for certain effects to be triggered.

skills.name: S2 (Skill) Illusion Cutter
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 80% chance to reduce Defense of the target for 2 turns. Addtionally, has a 80% chance to trigger Flurry 1 time. Additionally, inflicts 2 stacks of Hunter's Mark for 5 turns if the target is a light elemental. Attack strength increases based on user's Speed. Flurry uses Normal Attack on a random enemy. Flurry cannot be triggered multiple times in a row. Cannot be triggered by attacks that do not take turns.

skills.name: S3 (Ultimate) Tempest of the Umbral Moon
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Ignores Defense. This attack deals 150% more danmage if the target's Defense is reduced. 100% chance to reduce the action gauge of the target by 10% up to a maximum of 40% and deals 80% more damage up to 240% for every stack of Hunter's Mark on the target. Removes 2 stacks of Hunter's Mark from the target. Attack strength increases based on the user's Speed.

skills.name: (Aptitude Skill) Nix's Tenacity
skills.description: Increases Attack and Defense of the user by 10% for every dark ally on the field.

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Unreachable Yearning
skills.description: Increases damage against light enemies by 5%

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Footsteps of Shadow
skills.description: Increase Speed by 3

characters.name: Water Aslan
characters.description: A Support Commander. His recommended stats are Attack and Speed. He's acquired by Hero Contract/Contract Summon

skills.name: S1 (Basic ATK) Graviton Slash
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. 90% chance to reduce the action gauge of the target by 10%. 90% chance to reduce the action gauge of the target by an additional 20% if the target is a fire elemental.

skills.name: S2 (Skill) Call to Arms
skills.description: Grants Taking the Lead to the user (stacks up to 4 times). Increases Speed of all allies for 2 turns. Increases Attack Strength of all water allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: S3 (Ultimate) Mountain Crusher
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. Deals up to 5x additional damage based on the target's maximum health. Triggers the following effects based on number of stacks of Taking the Lead on the user. 1 or more stacks: Fills the action gauge of the ally with the highest Attack by 30%. 2 or more stacks: Fills the action gauge of the ally with the highest Attack by an additional 30%. 4 or more stacks: Fills the action gauge of the ally with the highest Attack by an additional 40% if the ally is a water elemental.

skills.name: (Commander Skill) Pillar of Conquest
skills.description: Increases burst gauge gain of all allies by 100% within the Calamity's Cradle and the Temporal Rift.

skills.name: (Aptitude Skill) Leviathan's Grace
skills.description: Deals 3% additional damage that ignores defense for every water ally on the field upon attacking (up to a maximum of 24%).

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Unmatched Pride
skills.description: Increases Speed by 3

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Dewdrop Vitality
skills.description: Increases damage against fire enemies by 5%

characters.name: Fire Aurea
characters.description: A Support Warrior. Her recommended stats are Defense and Speed. SHe's acquired by Featured Summon

skills.name: S1 (Basic ATK) One Moment Please
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. Inflicts 1 stack of Hunters Mark on the target for 5 turns. Damage dealt increases based on the user's Speed. Upon counterattacking, Increases Speed of the user by 3 (stacks up to 10 times). This effect expires after defeating a wave of enemies. Hunter's Mark is an effect that stacks and serves as a condition for certain effects to be triggered.

skills.name: S2 (Skill) Almost Finished!
skills.description: Removes all debuffs from the user. Grants Pierce and Divine Luck to the user for 3 turns. Additionally, has a 80% chance to trigger Flurry respectively up to a maximum of 2 times. Divine Luck features a 25% chance to gain an extra turn. Up to 3 extra turns can be gained this way. Flurry is an effect that will use a Normal Attack on a random enemy. Cannot be triggered by attacks that do not take turns.

skills.name: S3 (Ultimate) All Done!
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Deals 200% more damage if the user is under the effects of Divine Luck. Damage dealt increases based on the user's Speed. Triggers the following effects based on the number of Hunter's Mark Stacks on the target. 2 or more stacks: Deals 100% more damage. 4 or more stacks: Deals 100% more damage. 6 or more: Removes all Hunter's Mark stacks from the target and fills the action gauge of all allies by 100%.

skills.name: (Aptitude Skill) Ifrit's Tenacity
skills.description: Increases Attack and Defense of the user by 10% for every fire ally on the field.

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Basting
skills.description: Increases Speed by 3

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Tying Off
skills.description: Increases damage against earth enemies by 5%

characters.name: Water Baretta
characters.description: An Offense Cleric. Her recommended stats are Attack and Speed. She's acquired by Hero Contract/Contract Summon

skills.name: S1 (Basic ATK) Fly Like a Butterfly
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. Heals the ally with the lowest health based on the user's Attack. Healing is in proportion to the user's attack power. 50% chance for her luck to kick in and heal the ally a second time.

skills.name: S2 (Skill) Relax Like a Boss
skills.description: Heal all allies based on the user's Attack. 50% chance for her luck to kick in and increase all allies' action gauges by 40%. 99% chance to grant Fortitude to the user for 1 turn. Fortitude makes it impossible to fall in battle regardless of damage taken.

skills.name: S3 (Ultimate) Sting Like a Bee
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. Fully heals the user before putting her to sleep for 1 turn(s). Generates a shield for all allies based on the user's attack power that lasts 2 turn(s).

skills.name: (Aptitude Skill) Leviathan's Blessing
skills.description: Upon taking a turn, 15% chance to revive water-elemental allies and heal them for 15% of their health.

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Best Bet
skills.description: Increases Resistance by 3

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Chaotic Clumsiness
skills.description: Reduces damage taken from fire enemies by 5%.

characters.name: Dark Brandon
characters.description: An Offense Sniper. His recommended stats are Health and Speed. He's acquired by Featured Summon

skills.name: S1 (Basic ATK) Souls' Banquet
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. 80% chance to reduce Attack and Speed of the target for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: S2 (Skill) Relax Like a Boss
skills.description: Heal all allies based on the user's Attack. 50% chance for her luck to kick in and increase all allies' action gauges by 40%. 99% chance to grant Fortitude to the user for 1 turn. Fortitude makes it impossible to fall in battle regardless of damage taken.

skills.name: S3 (Ultimate) Sting Like a Bee
skills.description: Attacks the selected enemy. Fully heals the user before putting her to sleep for 1 turn(s). Generates a shield for all allies based on the user's attack power that lasts 2 turn(s).

skills.name: (Aptitude Skill) Leviathan's Blessing
skills.description: Upon taking a turn, 15% chance to revive water-elemental allies and heal them for 15% of their health.

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Best Bet
skills.description: Increases Resistance by 3

skills.name: (Passive Skill) Chaotic Clumsiness
skills.description: Reduces damage taken from fire enemies by 5%.
